name: Tyrannosaurus
behaviors: Ambush predator, relies on it's huge and powerful jaws to cripple prey before it can escape.
Seems to prefer remaining in familiar land rather than roaming around.
Incredibly territorial around food, and will not allow smaller creatures to take from their kills.

rules.content: Extremely aggressive towards other adult Tyrannosaurus outside of their pair, and will not tolerate them in their personal space.
